title: The Last days of Chez Nous
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Marriage
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Academy awards (Motion pictures)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Shared housing
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Shared housing
description: Beth (Lisa Harrow) is a successful novelist who runs her career and inner-city household, "Chez Nous" with great energy and humour, despite her hectic life with her French husband (Bruno Ganz), her carefree teenage daughter (Miranda Otto) and a new boarder (Kiri Paramore). The return of her younger sister, Vicky (Kerry Fox) sparks a chain of events which escalate in the intense heat of an Australian Summer and could spell the last days of "Chez Nous". Also stars Bill Hunter.
